The story revolves around William Fordham, a frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s. He is pursued by members of his own hunting team after being mauled by a bear.

The movie is known for its intense action scenes and stunning cinematography. The movie received critical acclaim and won numerous awards including three Academy Awards for Best Actor, two Golden Globes Awards for Best Motion Picture – Drama, Best Director, and one BAFTA Award for Best Film.
